headline: Uber Expands Into Air Taxis And Robotaxis As Growth Story Evolves
summary: Uber Technologies (NYSE:UBER) has launched Uber Air in partnership with Joby Aviation, introducing all electric air taxis starting in Dubai. The company has also introduced Uber Autonomous Solutions, a commercial platform aimed at supporting large scale deployment of robotaxis globally. These two launches expand Uber's platform beyond traditional ride hailing into aerial and autonomous mobility services. Uber Technologies now sits at a share price of $75.42, with a value score of 6 and a 3...
